pages.title: 洗矿机
pages.text: <item>洗矿机/$是矿物三倍产出中的<em>可选/$阶段。它使用<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)蒸汽/$将来自<item>$(l:crossroads:rotary/stamp)捣磨机/$的<item>粗金属砂/$处理成<item>金属碎块/$和副产物<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)脏水/$。这样处理后，<item>$(l:crossroads:rotary/blast)高炉/$在后续处理中消耗的煤炭/木炭就会减少。$(br2)

流体在洗矿机顶部输出，流体则从侧面输入。每次操作都会消耗250mB的<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)蒸汽/$并产出 250 mB 的<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)脏水/$。这些<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)脏水/$可在<item>$(l:crossroads:fluid/centrifuge)水离心机/$中再处理。$(br2)<thing>$(l:essentials/circuits#reader)读取器电路/$可测量输入槽的充满程度。$(br2)
<bobo>Bobojour！Glüten tag！Comichiewa！右到勒$(l:crossroads:intro/welcome#bobo)BOBO/$<bobo>时间！$(br2)<bobo>窝有蹦题示！！$(br2)<bobo>黑闪亮石头，管，海绵！$(br2)<bobo>boqr离开/$$(br2)
